title: Creating a Line Plot
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a line plot using Python Matplotlib. A line plot is a way of displaying data points on a line. It is used to show the trend of a particular set of data over time.

meta.title: Creating a Line Plot in Python
meta.description: Learn how to create a line plot using Python Matplotlib to visualize data trends.
meta.keywords: line plot, data visualization, Python, Matplotlib, NumPy
